channel.title: Cybersecurity on Álvaro Orgaz
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Álvaro Orgaz

item.title: Credential Switcher
item.description: A simple PowerShell script that allows the user to temporarily switch to use different credentials with higher permissions to carry out specific tasks and reverts back to the original credentials automatically after some time or once the user confirms the task is completed.

item.title: SuperDucky
item.description: SuperDucky is an enhanced version of Hack5 Rubber Ducky BadUSB.
